Chrysler minivans. The redesigned 2011 Chrysler Town& Country and Dodge Grand Caravan have been driving off the assembly line for several weeks, and the vehicles are selling well, Sergio Marchionne has said. I think whenever we launch new products coming out of these plants, we need to be there, said Sergio Marchionne last Wednesday during the North American International Auto Show in Detroit.`` I think it's an important recognition of the effort that's gone in here by our colleagues on the shop floor.''

to keep the automaker from collapse in 2009.`` I want to pay back the shyster loans,'' Sergio Marchionne said at an industry conference, using a derogatory term for an unprincipled lawyer or politician. Association, Sergio Marchionne talked about the eventual possibility of merging Fiat and Chrysler, saying that maintaining them as separate companies forever didn't make sense. Then he said, in an offhand manner, I want to pay back the shyster loans first. Chrysler owes$ 5.8 billion to the U.S. Treasury and$ 2.3 billion to the Canadian government at an average interest rate of 11%, Chief Financial Officer Rick Snyder Palmer said last Monday.

friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelly, she told NBC's`` Meet The Press.'' Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said.`` It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury,'' she added.
